de.systemagmbh.interfaces
Class ASysException

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Throwable
      java.lang.Exception
          de.systemagmbh.interfaces.ASysException
All Implemented Interfaces:
ISysECDOffsets, Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
CSysBusException, CSysConfigException, CSysDBRException, CSysLoggerException, CSysMessageException, CSysServiceException, CSysSplashScreenException, CSysTableException, StubASysException
public abstract class ASysException
extends Exception
implements ISysECDOffsets

Since we need multilingual Exception Messages and Errorcodes that are unique within the scope of the CIM System (not application) we introduced an id for the type of Exception. This class is the base class for tool and module exceptions defined by Systema GmbH.

Version:
$Revision: 1.7 $
Author:
Herbert Helmstreit, Udo Friedrich
See Also:
Serialized Form

ASysException

protected ASysException()
Create a new instance of an ASysException

ASysException

public ASysException(int id)
Constructs an Exception with no specified detail message.

Parameters:
id - The error code; Components must not use values others than their assigned range.

ASysException

public ASysException(int id,
                     String s)
Constructs an Exception with the specified detail message.

Parameters:
id - The error code; Components must not use values others than their assigned range.
s - The detail message.

ASysException

public ASysException(int id,
                     Object[] args)
Constructs an exception with additional information for a compound error message.

Parameters:
id - The error code; Components must not use values others than their assigned range.
args - This is an array of arguments that are parsed into the language dependent exception text. The text must have place holders of the form {n} where n is a number starting at 0.

ASysException

public ASysException(int id,
                     String s,
                     Object[] args)
Constructs an exception with the specified detail message and additional information for a compound error message.

Parameters:
id - The error code; Components must not use values others than their assigned range.
s - The detail message.
args - This is an array of arguments that are parsed into the language dependent exception text. The text must have place holders of the form {n} where n is a number starting at 0.

ASysException

public ASysException(int id,
                     Object[] args,
                     Format[] formats)
Constructs an exception with additional information for a compound error message that contains one or more choice formats.

Parameters:
id - The error code; Components must not use values others than their assigned range.
args - This is an array of arguments that are parsed into the language dependent exception text. The text must have place holders of the form {n} where n is a number starting at 0.
formats - This is an array of Formats that can be used to format the message.

ASysException

public ASysException(int id,
                     String s,
                     Object[] args,
                     Format[] formats)
Constructs an exception with the specified detail message and additional information for a compound error message that contains one or more choice formats.

Parameters:
id - The error code; Components must not use values others than their assigned range.
s - The detail message.
args - This is an array of arguments that are parsed into the language dependent exception text. The text must have place holders of the form {n} where n is a number starting at 0.
formats - This is an array of Formats that can be used to format the message.
Method Detail

getType

public abstract String getType()
Every Implementing class must at least override this.
This must return the corresponding type defined in ISysComponent if available.

Returns:
the component type to that the exception belongs.

Get the Error code.
